page.title: 09 Holidays
page.content: Our survey showed that slightly less people were going on holiday this year than last.The most popular holiday areas were North Wales and Cornwall. Less than one tenth of our survey said they were going abroad. The most popular resorts were Skegness,Great Yarmouth and Weston Super Mare. Most people go away in August,usually for a week. The majority now travel by car. Very few travel by train. We found the most popular accommodation was a caravan followed by a hotel. We asked groups of people where they would go for a day out from Tamworth. Amongst adults the most popular choices were London and York. Amongst children the chices were Drayton Manor,Alton Towers and Gullivers Kingdom at Matlock.
